name: buttons
meaning: topic 0: various buttons e.g. power and volume control

name: motorola_misc
meaning: topic 1: for or related to motorola products

name: fit_head
meaning: topic 2: how the headeset fit on one's head and ear, such as with glasses

name: noise_cancellation
meaning: topic 3: whether the people you are talking to can hear background noise, especially in cars, whether has noise cancellation feature

name: misc_issues_problems
meaning: topic 4: miscellaneous problems and issues

name: cheap
meaning: topic 5: cheaply priced headsets (positive: good quality for the price; negative: breaks easy don't buy)

name: phone_connection
meaning: topic 6: connection between headset and phone, signal range, reconnection etc

name: fit_ear
meaning: topic 7: fit on into/ear, due to e.g. earbud depth, cover, ear hook shape, ear wires

name: great_overall
meaning: topic 8: highly satisfied overall, specially good quality for the price

name: sound_quality
meaning: topic 9: sound quality, sometimes with detailed evaluation, bass

name: plantronics
meaning: topic 10: (primarily) high praises for the plantronics brand

name: not_sure
meaning: topic 11: not sure about meaning

name: jabra
meaning: topic 12: for the jabra brand

name: charging
meaning: topic 13: everything related to charging the headset: cables, charging speed, through car-charger, on-the-go charger

name: audio_performance
meaning: topic 14: experience (not just soundwise) listening to music, audiobooks, video

name: not_sure
meaning: topic 15: not sure about meaning

name: voice_command
meaning: topic 16: Quality of voice command functionality/app for making calls and answering phones

name: transaction_experience
meaning: topic 17: Customer service experience related to shipping, return, replacement

name: active_lifestyle
meaning: topic 18: Usability in a active/sports setting, such as during running and gym workout

name: battery
meaning: topic 19: Quality of battery e.g. talk time on full charge, battery indicator, deteriation over time
